channel.title: Github on Computational Demography @UW
channel.description: Recent content in Github on Computational Demography @UW

item.title: Making a Research Website
item.description: Why make a website? Academic researchers need to communicate their work! Several kinds of websites can be useful for this: a personal academic homepage a page for a specific research project a website for a course a website for a working group or seminar (like CDWG!) Key ideas You can make a website without knowing much or any html/css; there are tools that let you do a lot in plain text and R instead.
